# ⌨️ CLI Reference

DeepRM provides a modular CLI with top-level groups and subcommands.  
Use `--help` at any level to see available options.

```bash
deeprm --help
deeprm check --help
deeprm call --help
deeprm train --help
deeprm qc --help
```

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 1
:caption: Commands

check
call
train
qc
```
